title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Applying the COST Model for Interaction-Based Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language structure and digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners design and execute language projects utilizing the four interaction dimensions of the COST model (C: Content, O: Others, S: Self, T: Task).
Learners enhance language learning outcomes by at least 30% through the integration of digital tools (e.g., collaboration platforms, AI translators).
Learners produce project deliverables including language analysis, cultural context integration, and self-reflection reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
